name: Battlemages - The Last Standing Wiz
description:
A Magic Battle begins and only the last one standing wizard will survive!

Construct your character and select a number of opponents before entering the battle.
Manage your inventory and equipment wisely to increase your chances to win.
Use your abilities (Mana, Health, Stamina) to defeat your enemies.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
    Left Mouse Button - Attack
    Shift - Sprint
    Space - Jump
    Q - Slow motion ability
    Esc - Pause
    I - Inventory
    U - Equipment
    E - Interact with objects
